original_text: Your own hands created me. So you should not be cruel to me. It is not right. Instead, you are kind to wicked people. You help them to do the bad things that they want to do. Your own hands created me.
korean_text: 주께서 주의 손으로 지으신 것을 학대하시며 멸시하시고 악인의 꾀에 빛을 비추시기를 선히 여기시나이까

sentences.original_text: So you should not be cruel to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 나에게 잔인해서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, you are kind to wicked people.
You help them to do the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 나쁜 일을 하도록 도와줍니다.
